title: pr.probability - Comparison of two Fourier transforms
body: I am looking for $\delta>0$ , such that $$ \delta \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} \exp(its) { \Gamma\{2(it+1)/3\}\over \Gamma\{(it+1)/2\} }dt \le \\ \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} \exp(its) { \Gamma (it+1)\over \Gamma\{(it+1)/2\} }dt $$ for any $s>0$ . Ideally I want to find $\delta(\beta)$ such that $$ \delta(\beta_1) \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} \exp(its) { \Gamma\{(it+1)/\beta_1\}\over \Gamma\{(it+1)/2\} }dt \le \\ \delta(\beta_2) \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} \exp(its) { \Gamma \{(it+1)/\beta_2\}\over \Gamma\{(it+1)/2\} }dt $$ for any $s>0$ , $1<\beta_2<\beta_1<2$ . However it is far more complicated problem. Any hints will be greatly appreciated pr.probability real-analysis cv.complex-variables fourier-analysis fourier-transform Share Cite Improve this question Follow edited Jul 22, 2020 at 12:45 asked Jul 22, 2020 at 2:46 Vova 93 7 7 bronze badges $\endgroup$ Add a comment  |  0 Sorted by: Reset to default Highest score (default) Date modified (newest first) Date created (oldest first) You must log in to answer this question.
